thread.title: Greg Keevers

author: Greg Keevers
title: Greg Keevers
text: Heads up to Motorama Springwood Mitsubishi and to the salesman Dale Timmins sales manager Lisa Lions and business manager Mitchell Williams. I walked into there dealership knowing what I wanted to purchase I never felt pressured at any time nor did they try to up sell me to another vehicle. I was happy with the offer we agreed on to purchase my new Triton and the deal was done. Picked it up on the agreed time I wanted and ran through everything the vehicle had to offer. Took some photos got the keys and we couldn't be happier congratulations to the team at Springwood
